owner_summaries.key_concerns: High number of reconciliation exceptions and duplicate detections

residual_risks.description: Significant number of flux analysis exceptions indicating potential misstatements
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance flux analysis procedures and increase frequency of reviews

residual_risks.description: Unresolved bank and AP reconciliation exceptions could lead to cash flow issues
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement automated reconciliation tools and conduct regular audits
